steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"7sctn","text":"Culture the HeLa-M cells at   in 5% CO2 and DMEM containing 10% FBS,   penicillin,   streptomycin, and   L-glutamine (all from Gibco).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"sub","offset":38,"length":1}],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":28,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":69,"length":1},{"key":2,"offset":83,"length":1},{"key":3,"offset":103,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"491kp","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"05CF5690E00311EB90FD8148BA8D1498","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"37","unit":10}},"1":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"100","error":false,"guid":"0BBE32B0E00311EB90FD8148BA8D1498","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1584}},"2":{"type":"concentration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"concentration":"100","error_concentration":false,"guid":"13E80AB0E00311EB90FD8148BA8D1498","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":204}},"3":{"type":"concentration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"concentration":"2","error_concentration":false,"guid":"16469420E00311EB90FD8148BA8D1498","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":28}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"4rsmh","text":"Every 10 minutes, pipette lysis mixture up and down 10 times with a P-200 pipette tip (a total of 3 cycles).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"er8g1","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"csfcl","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"notes","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"50o35","text":"NOTE: Take care not to introduce bubbles.","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"eaur6","text":"Centrifuge at   for   at   and collect the post-nuclear supernatant in a new Eppendorf tube.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":14,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":20,"length":1},{"key":2,"offset":25,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"fspqh","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":3,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"7t07s","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"21nvf","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"cgs1u","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"bri4d","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"centrifuge","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"centrifuge":"15000","duration":0,"error_centrifuge":false,"error_temperature":false,"guid":"EF2E3A40E00311EB90FD8148BA8D1498","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"scientificNotation":{"centrifuge":false,"temperature":false},"start":null,"temperature":"","temperatureUnit":10,"unit":34}},"1":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":600,"guid":"F57F0C80E00311EB90FD8148BA8D1498","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}},"2":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"F7967AD0E00311EB90FD8148BA8D1498","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"4","unit":10}},"3":{"type":"notes","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"esllu","text":"NOTE: Samples can be snap frozen in liquid nitrogen at this step and stored at -70˚C.","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}}}}}
